      • createQueryFieldByPath

        protected QueryField createQueryFieldByPath(java.lang.String path,
                                Query query,
                                boolean addToSelect)
        Create a queryField starting from the path given in input and add the contain constraints between all the queryclass composing the path. If addToSelect is true, add the queryFiled as select, group by and order by element.
        Parameters:
        path - the path used to create the queryField. The path doesn't containt the startClass
        query - the query to modify
        addToSelect - if true add the queryFiled as select, group by and order by element
        Returns:
        the queryField created
